title: Loopy Printer
description: Create a program that uses a loop to print the numbers from 1 to n, but with a twist. If the number is divisible by 3, print 'Loopy' instead of the number. If the number is divisible by 5, print 'Printer' instead of the number. If the number is divisible by both 3 and 5, print 'LoopyPrinter'.
